Mimosas Member Packages

Mimosas Member's Manicure:
(1 is included monthly for our members)

Enjoy your special drink and release all the stresses of your neck with a lavender warming neck wrap. Next, is cleansing, shaping, cuticle care, exfoliating dry skin with organic sugar scrub. Then relaxing and hydrating your hands with an organic therapeutic soy candle lotion.

FREE!

Mimosas Member's Pedicure:

Only for our members, enjoy your special drink and release all the stresses of your neck with a warm lavender neck wrap and soak your tired feet in luxurious and comforting detox water. After cleansing, shaping and cuticle care, a callus softening serum will be used to remove tough, dead skin. An organic sugar scrub that gently exfoliates dry skin and reveals softer, smoother skin. Finish with a relaxing foot massage with a hydrating and therapeutic warm candle lotion and a deep-penetrating paraffin therapy wrapped in hot towels.

$35

Mimosas Services

uptown minute

The perfect service for those on the go! Includes nail shaping, cuticle grooming, buffing, hydrating creme massage and the polish of your choice.

Mani: $20 - Pedi: $35 - Undivided: $50

uptown all around

This nourishing treatment embodies all natural, organic based products. Includes nail shaping, cuticle care, exfoliating, organic raw sugar scrub, callus treatment (for pedicure), deep-penetrating paraffin therapy and a hot towel wrap, ending with a refreshing and hydrating massage and polish of your choice.

Mani: $30 - Pedi: $45 - Undivided: $70

uptown penthouse

Detoxifying and healing begins with an aromatherapy bath soak of organic sea salt and ancient Himalayan pink salts. The skin is polished and renewed with an organic raw sugar scrub followed by a deep moisturizing oil treatment with both a hydrating organic clay mask and a deep-penetrating paraffin therapy wrapped in hot towels. Release all the stresses of life with an extended foot and calf massage that includes an organic emulsion combined with hot stones. Followed by a nourishing cream massage to hydrated restore and revitalize your tired skin.

Mani: $40 - Pedi: $60 - Undivided: $95

little king or queen

9 years old and under.

Mani: $12 - Pedi: $20 - Undivided: $30

Uptown Penthouse Undivided: $85
